document.heading: Oyster Elementary School Modernization and Development Project Temporary Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-215, the “Oyster Elementary School Modernization and Development Project Temporary Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-828. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 17, 1996, and October 1, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 15, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-413 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-215 became effective on April 9, 1997.
